alert.note: Alert for Clark (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued December 15 at 8:33PM CST until December 15 at 9:15PM CST by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 915 PM CST FOR HENRY...EASTERN VAN BUREN...EASTERN JEFFERSON...LEE AND CLARK COUNTIES... At 832 PM CST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Coppock to near Kahoka, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. A 65 mph wind was measured in Atkins at 832 pm. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Locations impacted include... Fort Madison, Keokuk, Fairfield, Mount Pleasant, Kahoka, Nauvoo, Hamilton, New London, Warsaw, Winfield, West Point, Donnellson, Montrose, Wayland, Birmingham, Bonaparte, Salem, Stockport, Lockridge and Olds. TORNADO...POSSIBLE THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1100 PM CST for west central Illinois...southeastern Iowa...and northeastern Missouri.
